entry.title: Saturday: Ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to periods of snow this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
